name: Logitech Z337 - Speaker system - for PC - 2.1-channel - Bluetooth - 40-watt (total) | Dell USA
description: Enjoy the convenience of wireless streaming and never worry about battery life because this 2.1 speaker system is always plugged in. Its 80 Watts Peak/40 Watts RMS power delivers bold sound. Easily access the Bluetooth pairing button from the wired control pod. Adjust the bass level with the dedicated control knob on the back of the subwoofer. For a wired connection use the 3.5 mm or RCA inputs.
